options.content: - Durch nachträgliche Importe und Speicherung der Daten kann es im Vergleich mit anderen Stichtags-Erhebungen (z.B. den Berichten der Medienforschungen) Abweichungen bei den Daten geben.

panels.title: Hinweise

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT profile) 
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr

panels.title: Entwicklung: Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month, SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/1000000 as videoViews10sMill FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat <= 12
ELSE monat <= 12 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC

panels.title: Summe Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt (in Mio.)

options.content: ### Anteil Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt | Top 8 | $Month
### Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt (in Mio.)

targets.rawSql:
WITH top_8_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt as Views
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt DESC
LIMIT 8
), rest AS(
  SELECT "Rest" as profile, SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt) as Views
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
AND profile NOT IN (SELECT profile FROM top_8_profiles)
)
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
Views FROM(
SELECT profile, Views FROM top_8_profiles
UNION ALL
SELECT profile, Views FROM rest
WHERE CASE 
WHEN profile = "Rest" THEN Views IS NOT NULL 
ELSE TRUE END)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Ø Pro Tag')), 'Ø Pro Tag')
FROM(
SELECT 'Ø Pro Tag' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $Jahr) as Gesamt
)

SELECT
SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/1000000 as videoViews10sMill,
(SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as videoViews10sMillPerDay
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CASE $month_as_number
            WHEN 19 THEN ""
            ELSE "$LastMonat_abkuerzung $YearFromLastMonth"
            END As Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
(SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
(SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $LastJahr) as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
(SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
(SUM(videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

panels.title: Abonnenten | ${Month}

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
profile, profileId, abonnements as Abonnements
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(Abonnements,0) as Abonnements FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY Abonnements DESC

panels.title: Abonnements | Stichtag: $Stichtag

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
lm.profile,
profileId,
lm_follower,
(lm_follower/llm_follower - 1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(
SELECT
profile, profileId, abonnements as lm_follower
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY abonnements desc
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT
profile, abonnements as llm_follower
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY abonnements desc
) as llm 
ON llm.profile = lm.profile
ORDER BY lm.lm_follower DESC
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(FollowerVeraenderung,0) as FollowerVeraenderung FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY lm_follower DESC

panels.title: Veränderung zum ${Vormonat} in %
Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt |  ${Month}

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
profile, profileId, videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt as videoViews
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(videoViews,0) as videoViews FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY videoViews DESC

Gesamte Wiedergabedauer für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt | $Month

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
profile, profileId, sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt as sehVolumen
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(sehVolumen,0) as sehVolumen FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY sehVolumen DESC

panels.title: Gesamte Wiedergabedauer in Stunden für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt
Interaktionen für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt |  ${Month}

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
profile, profileId, interactions_zeitraum_genutzt as interactions
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(interactions,0) as interactions FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY interactions DESC

panels.title: Interaktionen für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt
Top Videos nach Videostarts (Videos im Zeitraum genutzt) | $Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
Profil,
Datum,
Dauer,
averageViewTime,
sehVolumen,
title,
views, 
link,
likes + dislikes + comments + shares as interactions,
averageViewPercentage,
abo_change,
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_top_videos_nach_videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 100

panels.title: Top Videos im Zeitraum genutzt | ${Month}
Top One Video je Kanal (Videos im Zeitraum genutzt) |  $Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
  Profil,
  Datum,
  Titel,
  Wiedergaben,
  link,
  Dauer,
sehVolumen,
averageViewPercentage,
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_top_video_je_kanal_zeitraum_genutzt
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY Wiedergaben DESC

panels.title: Top One Video im Zeitraum genutzt je Kanal | $Month
Zusammenfassung aller Kanäle (Videos im Zeitraum genutzt) | $Monat $Jahr

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), current_values AS(
SELECT profile, abonnements as current_abonnements, videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt as current_videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt, sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt as current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt, interactions_zeitraum_genutzt as current_interactions_zeitraum_genutzt
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"),
past_values AS(
SELECT profile, abonnements as past_abonnements, videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt as past_videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt, sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt as past_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt, interactions_zeitraum_genutzt as past_interactions_zeitraum_genutzt
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
), joined_data AS(
SELECT * FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN 
current_values
USING(profile)
LEFT JOIN 
past_values
USING(profile))
SELECT profile as Profil,
current_abonnements as followers,
current_abonnements - past_abonnements as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_abonnements,past_abonnements)-1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung,

current_videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt as videoViews10s,
current_videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt - past_videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt as videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt,past_videostarts_zeitraum_genutzt)-1)*100 as videoViews10sVeraenderung,


current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt as sehVolumenVariable,
current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt - past_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt as sehVolumenVariableVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt,past_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_genutzt)-1)*100 as sehVolumenVariableVeraenderung,


current_interactions_zeitraum_genutzt as interactionenVariable,
current_interactions_zeitraum_genutzt - past_interactions_zeitraum_genutzt as interactionenVariableVeraenderungAbsolut,
(SAFE_DIVIDE(current_interactions_zeitraum_genutzt,past_interactions_zeitraum_genutzt)-1)*100 as interactionenVariableVeraenderung,


FROM joined_data
ORDER BY Profil DESC

panels.title: Zusammenfassung aller Kanäle | $Month
Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum veröffentlicht (Nutzung bis zum Stichtag $stichtagmonat) | $Month

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
profile, profileId, videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht as videoViews
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(videoViews,0) as videoViews FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY videoViews DESC

panels.title: Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum veröffentlicht

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_data AS(
  SELECT 
profile, profileId, anzahlVideos_zeitraum_veroffentlicht as profileIdSum, videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht as videoViews
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(profileIdSum,0) as profileIdSum FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_data
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY videoViews DESC

panels.title: Top One Video im Zeitraum veröffentlicht je Profil (Nutzung bis zum Stichtag $stichtagmonat) |  $Month
Zusammenfassung aller Kanäle Videos im Zeitraum veröffentlicht (Nutzung bis zum Stichtag $stichtagmonat) | $Month

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, youtubeID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND youtubeID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), current_values AS(
SELECT profile, abonnements as current_abonnements, videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht as current_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht, sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht as current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht, interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht as current_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"),
past_values AS(
SELECT profile, abonnements as past_abonnements, videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht as past_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht, sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht as past_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht, interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht as past_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
), joined_data AS(
SELECT * FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN 
current_values
USING(profile)
LEFT JOIN 
past_values
USING(profile))
SELECT profile as Profil,
CASE current_abonnements
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_abonnements END as followers,
CASE current_abonnements - past_abonnements
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_abonnements - past_abonnements END as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_abonnements,past_abonnements)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_abonnements,past_abonnements)-1)*100 END as FollowerVeraenderung,

CASE current_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht END as videoViews10s,
CASE current_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht - past_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht - past_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht END as videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht,past_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht)-1)*100
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht,past_videostarts_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht)-1)*100 END as videoViews10sVeraenderung,


CASE current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht END as sehVolumenVariable,
CASE current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht - past_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht - past_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht END as sehVolumenVariableVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht,past_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht)-1)*100
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht,past_sehVolumen_in_std_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht)-1)*100 END as sehVolumenVariableVeraenderung,


CASE current_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht END as interactionenVariable,
CASE current_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht - past_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht - past_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht END as interactionenVariableVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht,past_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht,past_interactions_zeitraum_veroeffentlicht)-1)*100 END as interactionenVariableVeraenderung,


FROM joined_data
ORDER BY Profil DESC

panels.title: Zusammenfassung aller Kanäle Videos im Zeitraum veröffentlicht | $Month

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
SELECT "MDR" as LRA
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "NDR"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "KiKA"
UNION DISTINCT 
SELECT "Radio Bremen"
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

WITH months AS (
  SELECT 'Januar' AS month_name, 1 AS month_value, DATE($Jahr,02,08) AS min_date
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Februar', 2, DATE($Jahr,03,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'März', 3, DATE($Jahr,04,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'April', 4, DATE($Jahr,05,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Mai', 5, DATE($Jahr,06,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Juni', 6, DATE($Jahr,07,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Juli', 7, DATE($Jahr,08,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'August', 8, DATE($Jahr,09,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'September', 9, DATE($Jahr,10,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Oktober', 10, DATE($Jahr,11,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'November', 11, DATE($Jahr,12,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Dezember', 12, DATE($Jahr+1,01,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Jahr', 19, DATE($Jahr+1,01,08)
)
SELECT month_name
FROM months
WHERE CURRENT_DATE >= min_date
ORDER BY
CASE
WHEN month_value = (SELECT MAX(month_value) FROM months WHERE CURRENT_DATE() >= min_date AND month_value <= 12) AND $Jahr = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) THEN 0
ELSE 1 END, month_value ASC

WITH alle_jahre AS(
SELECT DISTINCT jahr
FROM Quintly_frozen.youtube_metrics
WHERE jahr > 2021)
 
SELECT CAST(jahr AS STRING)
FROM alle_jahre
ORDER BY
CASE
WHEN jahr = (SELECT MAX(jahr) FROM alle_jahre WHERE CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE(jahr || '-02-08')) THEN 0
ELSE 1 END, jahr DESC

SELECT
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT("Januar"," $Jahr")
WHEN 2 THEN CONCAT("Februar"," $Jahr")
WHEN 3 THEN CONCAT("März"," $Jahr")
WHEN 4 THEN CONCAT("April"," $Jahr")
WHEN 5 THEN CONCAT("Mai"," $Jahr")
WHEN 6 THEN CONCAT("Juni"," $Jahr")
WHEN 7 THEN CONCAT("Juli"," $Jahr")
WHEN 8 THEN CONCAT("August"," $Jahr")
WHEN 9 THEN CONCAT("September"," $Jahr")
WHEN 10 THEN CONCAT("Oktober"," $Jahr")
WHEN 11 THEN CONCAT("November"," $Jahr")
WHEN 12 THEN CONCAT("Dezember"," $Jahr")
WHEN 19 THEN "Jahr $Jahr"
END

SELECT
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
END

SELECT
CASE EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
END
SELECT CAST($Jahr - 1 AS STRING)
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1),INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING)

SELECT
CASE 
WHEN ($month_as_number = 19 AND DATE($Jahr+1, 1, 7) > CURRENT_DATE()) THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CURRENT_DATE())
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 THEN CONCAT("07.01.",CAST($Jahr+1 AS STRING))
WHEN DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,7), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) > CURRENT_DATE() THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CURRENT_DATE())
ELSE 
CASE $month_as_number
  WHEN 12 THEN FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',DATE($Jahr+1,01,07))--FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',PARSE_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CONCAT('07.01.', CAST($Jahr + 1 AS STRING))))
  ELSE FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number+1,07))
 --FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',PARSE_DATE('%d.%m.%Y', CONCAT('07.', LPAD(CAST($month_as_number + 1 AS STRING), 2, '0'), '.', CAST($Jahr AS STRING))))
END END

SELECT CASE $month_as_number
            WHEN 19 THEN "##"
            ELSE "## $LastMonat_abkuerzung  \n ## $YearFromLastMonth"
            END

current.text: EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = 2 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2025
current.value: EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = 2 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2025

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE "${Monat:text}"
    WHEN "Jahr" THEN "EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr"
    ELSE "EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $month_as_number AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr"
    END

SELECT CAST(zeitraum as STRING) FROM(
SELECT CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN 12
ELSE $month_as_number END AS zeitraum)

WITH max_time AS (SELECT MAX(time) as time FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.facebookInsights${table_suffix}` as facebook
            WHERE $Zeitraum AND page_follows IS not null)
SELECT CONCAT(EXTRACT(DAY FROM time),".", EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time),".", EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time)) FROM max_time

SELECT CASE "${Monat:text}"
      WHEN "Jahr" THEN "Vorjahr"
      ELSE "Vormonat "
      END
    as month_year

SELECT
CASE
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND CURRENT_DATE() < DATE($Jahr + 1, 1, 7) THEN "" 
WHEN CURRENT_DATE() > DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,7),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND $Jahr <= 2024 THEN "_frozen"
WHEN $Jahr < 2021 THEN ""
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND CURRENT_DATE() > DATE($Jahr, 1, 7) THEN "_frozen"
WHEN CURRENT_DATE() < DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,8),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) THEN ""
WHEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1)) <= DATE(2023,05,31) THEN ""
ELSE "" END

SELECT
CASE
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND CURRENT_DATE() < DATE($Jahr + 1, 1, 7) THEN "" 
WHEN CURRENT_DATE() > DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,7),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND $Jahr <= 2024 THEN CONCAT("_final_",CAST($Jahr AS STRING),"_", CAST($month_as_number AS STRING))
WHEN $Jahr < 2021 THEN ""
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND CURRENT_DATE() > DATE($Jahr, 1, 7) THEN CONCAT("_final_",CAST($Jahr AS STRING))
WHEN CURRENT_DATE() < DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,8),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) THEN ""
WHEN LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1)) <= DATE(2023,05,31) THEN ""
ELSE "" END

SELECT CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN CAST(0 AS STRING)
ELSE CAST(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $month_as_number, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING) END
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $month_as_number, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING)
SELECT CAST($Jahr-1 AS STRING)
SELECT CAST($month_as_number AS STRING)

SELECT CAST(number AS STRING) FROM (
SELECT
CASE "$Monat"
WHEN "Januar" THEN 1
WHEN "Februar" THEN 2
WHEN "März" THEN 3
WHEN "April" THEN 4
WHEN "Mai" THEN 5
WHEN "Juni" THEN 6
WHEN "Juli" THEN 7
WHEN "August" THEN 8
WHEN "September" THEN 9
WHEN "Oktober" THEN 10
WHEN "November" THEN 11
WHEN "Dezember" THEN 12
WHEN "Jahr" THEN 19
END as number)

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "KiKA" THEN "KiKa"
ELSE "$LRA" END

WITH nutzer AS (
  SELECT
CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "dev") THEN "dev"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "mefo") THEN "mefo"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@") THEN
      REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'@([^\.]+)')  -- Extracts part after '@' and before the first '.' Example: ad.westphal@ndr.de => ndr
    WHEN NOT CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@")
         AND (CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "viewer") 
         OR CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "podcast")) THEN
            REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'^([^-\s]+)')  -- Extracts part before the first '-'. Example: ndr-viewer => ndr
    ELSE
      "Anonym"
  END AS nutzer_lra
),
filter_string AS (
  SELECT """
LRA=${LRA}|::|Monat=${Monat}|::|Jahr=${Jahr}
""" AS filter
)

SELECT CONCAT(
  "https://vqggwrz.pa-cd.com/event?s=645199&idclient=minerva&events=%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22page.display%22%2C%22data%22%3A%7B%22page%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.name}",
  "%22%2C%22m_visits%22%3A1%2C%22minerva_dashboard_id%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.uid}",
  "%22%2C%22minerva_lra%22%3A%22",
  nutzer.nutzer_lra,
  "%22%2C%22minerva_filter%22%3A%22",
  filter_string.filter,
  "%22%7D%7D%5D"
) AS event_url
FROM nutzer, filter_string
